title: Sooo, about that new braum skin
body:
i would easily take El Braum over El Tigre
just sayin....

but in all seriousness, please, this needs to be a new braum skin
this is way too good of an idea to just pass up.



*Edit, 12/27/14
I decided to browse the forums on my phone tonight/this morning, before work, and I'm absolutely taken aback. 
This is one of my first threads and its like, the highest viewed/ most commented on, in this specific board. Super cool stuff. 

As someone mentioned, we definitely need a red to check this out. 

The work is not mine, and as I linked originally, you can find the actual artists work. 

If a red does show up, I would like to ask, if this were to win the art contest for its respective area, what are the chances of us seeing this in-game? I know that is not one of the prizes for winning the contest, but if it gathered enough attention, would it be possible? Or something remade by a riot employee to look a lot like this? I also understand, while braum is relatively new, he still doesn't need any new skins, not like some other guys...

I would love to see this sometime down the road, after some more champs get theirs. 

And lastly while I'm here, let's talk about that taric rework, nunu TU, and Leona splash art ;)

replies.body: I dislike wrestling so I prefer this (also it's an amazing skin) and I might get Braum for this skin if it were real, love the peppers.
Why not both? I like both.

As some credibility to my comment, I recently bought Ahri (even though I really wanted Ez, and Janna, and Morg, and Anivia, and Aatrox, and Noc, and quite a few others) *specifically* because of the Dauntless skin.

The problem is; El Tigre Braum is pulled from latino folklore, while El Braum is simply stereotypical.
While I think the skin is well done personally, I can definitely see why Riot would opt to not release something like this.

> [{quoted}](name=1st HanarSpectre,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=kf5Y0qvi,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2014-12-23T22:48:09.814+0000)
>
> The problem is; El Tigre Braum is pulled from latino folklore, while El Braum is simply stereotypical.
> While I think the skin is well done personally, I can definitely see why Riot would opt to not release something like this.

Even if it is stereotypical it isn't offensive? It's culture, sombrero and poncho are historically worn by many latinos in past generations and currently. A cactus is a plant native to mexico and other spanish speaking countries, and a pepper is a cultural food.

I approve of this message. I enjoy all parts and aspects of latino culture, even the stereotypical parts, its all part of my family's history.

Don't believe me? look at my name! {{champion:201}} _Viva El Braum_ {{champion:201}}

> [{quoted}](name=Grumpy%%%%%%,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=kf5Y0qvi,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2015-06-16T05:03:55.791+0000)
>
> I approve of this message. I enjoy all parts and aspects of latino culture, even the stereotypical parts, its all part of my family's history.
> 
> Don't believe me? look at my name! {{champion:201}} _Viva El Braum_ {{champion:201}}
yes this is an amazing and hilarious skin WE NEEDS DiS

> [{quoted}](name=thev0idmaster,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=kf5Y0qvi,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2014-12-23T21:22:59.836+0000)
>
> yes this is an amazing and hilarious skin WE NEEDS DiS

URF 2016!

YES!
That is a really cool skin. I'd instabuy if I played Braum.
110 out of 10.. its a hundred times better than the current El tigre ;P
Wow. That's amazing.
CAN WE GET A RED IN HERE?

YOU REPLACED POROS WITH CHICKENS.

-1

+1001
fixed
how do you know its not poro in chicken suit

> [{quoted}](name=1st HanarSpectre,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=kf5Y0qvi,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2014-12-23T22:48:09.814+0000)
>
> The problem is; El Tigre Braum is pulled from latino folklore, while El Braum is simply stereotypical.
> While I think the skin is well done personally, I can definitely see why Riot would opt to not release something like this.



> [{quoted}](name=Professor Robsta,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=kf5Y0qvi,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2014-12-23T23:38:25.215+0000)
>
> Aside from being extremely stereotypical, this is awesome!

It's called culture not stereotype. Don't mix them please.
I'm trying to say it may be offensive to some. I probably could have worded that better. This skin is still amazing.

> [{quoted}](name=Professor Robsta,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=kf5Y0qvi,comment-id=000500000000,timestamp=2014-12-24T01:27:01.786+0000)
>
> I'm trying to say it may be offensive to some. I probably could have worded that better. This skin is still amazing.

Saying it's stereotypical degrades the artist when it's aimed at culture.

> [{quoted}](name=Professor Robsta,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=kf5Y0qvi,comment-id=000500000000,timestamp=2014-12-24T01:27:01.786+0000)
>
> I'm trying to say it may be offensive to some. I probably could have worded that better. This skin is still amazing.

You're like the jerks that sue for people saying Merry Christmas.
yes please
Instabuy
High noon Braum looks neat.
Make this a skin riot, please
Logged into upvote this. That is a beautiful skin.
High Noon Braum?
Awesome chickens.

Oh..my..god...this so awesome XD

As a hispanic, I love it haha would buy a thousand times
I love these chickens. Remind me of Madagascar Penguins.

Quick, hide this skin before the SJW's find it!!

This skin is very cool though, I'd definitely buy it. Very colorful and very detailed!

I want this so much.

I don't even play Braum!

{{champion:201}} The Habanero is the hottest Pepper (In Mexico).
{{champion:63}}  had one too many.

El Tigre Braum is a good 975 skin, honestly.

El Braum here, however, would make a good 1820 skin if given appropriate lines to fit the theme.

I don't think Braum's been around nearly long enough to have a legendary skin yet, but it's certainly an idea worth holding on to for future use.
Looks hawt--err excuse me, I mean esta es muy caliente!
the chickens are soooo cuuuute
aslo rito could we have a new zed skin pls?
I think you have this thread confused with the one where they're talking about Zed skins.
So much better...
my friend i agree with you El Braum looks much better than El Tigre
AWESOMEE!!!{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
I want this so bad omg!!!!{{champion:201}}
I love it! Dope animation skills. Way better then El tigre ( even though its pretty cool too ). You should make a new concept for Swain brotha.
When this skin is coming im the first man to buy this.... even this need 3250rp
This'll only work if Riot can find Mexican Braum to voice him. Same lines, he needs the accent though.
This is amazing.
If the Q was the bull and the passive made a bull it wouldn't be as stereotypical
YES
High Noon Braum.
El Moustacho Braum
